body: Hey guys. I am a relatively old player who is coming back and I am wondering how I can join one of these teams? A lot has changed since I have been back so yeah I'm not sure how all this stuff works as I can't find anywhere to apply :( Please help
body_tagged: Hey guys. I am a relatively old player who is coming back and I am wondering how I can join one of these teams? A lot has changed since I have been back so yeah I'm not sure how all this stuff works as I can't find anywhere to apply :( Please help
title: How does one join a team?

replies.body: There are two sub forums for you to look at, looking for team and looking for members, I'd be more in detail but I'm on my phone XD
replies.body_tagged: There are two sub forums for you to look at, looking for team and looking for members, I'd be more in detail but I'm on my phone XD

replies.body:
People say to make an lft post,  lft means looking for team. But those usually dont work. 

Get to know some Players, get contacts and then ask leaders of different teams on Skype
replies.body_tagged:
People say to make an lft post,  lft means looking for team. But those usually dont work. 

Get to know some Players, get contacts and then ask leaders of different teams on Skype

replies.body: btw I think Assassins would be interested, so if you post your interest on this page, you might get invited :D
replies.body_tagged: btw I think Assassins would be interested, so if you post your interest on this page, you might get invited :D

replies.body: Go onto looking for members and apply for a team,  when you are invited you'll get a website notification and voila!
replies.body_tagged: Go onto looking for members and apply for a team,  when you are invited you'll get a website notification and voila!
